 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2033&user=10620> 	

Organisational Change Announcement- St. Honore
As part of our Group’s drive towards our Vision 2033: Bridging Horizons strategic choices of strengthening and expanding our partnership business in the Middle East and in Latin America, our Latin American (LATAM) operations, St. Honore, which the Group acquired in September 2017, will be fully integrated into our core business portfolio under Managed Companies effective 01 September 2025. Loriela Gomez, CEO of St Honore, will now report directly to David Vercruysse, President of Managed Companies.

We would like to take this opportunity to thank our Investments team for their support in managing our LATAM operations. The team will continue to support the Group's LATAM expansion strategy, further driving our Vision 2033 strategic pillar.

Something exciting is on the way

Transform Chalhoub is hitting the road this October in UAE & KSA.
This will be your chance to find out more about our journey to reinvent how we work — making everyday tasks simpler, faster, and more meaningful.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-4-min.png> 	

Vision 2033 - 33 Days Challenge

Day 10 of our Vision 2033 – 33 Days Challenge!

Today, Mohammed Aldabbagh, Managing Director of KSA, highlights the vital role of KSA in our Vision 2033 from expanding partnerships and creating new experiences to growing brands and developing national.
